id-17988.title: Brandstore
id-17988.post-content:
Let your brand shine with our Brandstore website template. The Brandstore template is a simple, clean, mobile-friendly design, helping customers shop from anywhere. The template is built to integrate with WooCommerce seamlessly, so you can start showcasing your products in minutes and accept online payments.

We also have a range of custom page templates for you to use as the foundation for your site and a range of beautiful preset designs we’ve created. It’s a modern design with a lot to recommend it, ideal for online stores.

Key features of the Brandstore template

  • High converting and lightweight online store template
  • Seamless integration with WooCommerce
  • Impressive hero image to display your best products and offers
  • Host of customization options from colors and typography to layout and more
  • Fully responsive and works perfectly well on mobile devices
id-17988.post-excerpt: Build the perfect online store using our high-converting Brandstore website template

id-58716.title: Love Nature
id-58716.post-content:
Looking for a flexible multipurpose website template? Look no further. This serene and tranquil design features elegant graphics and a professional layout. It's perfect for those looking to create a website that offers an escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life.

The template features a natural color palette with pops of green and blue, which will be sure to make your website feel like a tranquil escape. The template has been carefully crafted to exhibit your services in the most elegant way possible.

Key features of the Love Nature template

  • Well-designed multipurpose template
  • Elegant and serene design
  • Natural color palette with customization options
  • Professional and flexible layout
  • Compatible with popular page builders
id-58716.post-excerpt: Elegant and serene multipurpose design to build any type of website

id-94686.title: Agency
id-94686.post-content:
The Agency Signature template is a visionary design ideal for digital agencies of all shapes and sizes. It’s thoroughly modern, with bold typography and contrasting colors, ready to attract attention.

All pages have been thoughtfully designed to deliver all the elements a visitor looks for, with something to engage everywhere you look. The design is crisp and modern and can be fully customized using built-in tools or your favorite page builder. It’s a superb choice for any type of digital agency.

Key features of the Agency template

  • Stylish modern design inspires confidence.
  • Purposeful color-font pairing evokes an emotional response
  • Prebuilt pages to streamline setup. 
  • SEO friendly and fully responsive
  • Full compatibility with popular page builders
id-94686.post-excerpt: The Agency Signature template is a visionary design ideal for digital agencies of all shapes and sizes. It’s thoroughly modern, […]

id-19808.title: Outdoor Adventure
id-19808.post-content:
If you're looking for a multipurpose website template that will be the perfect match for your business, this is it. This outdoor adventure website template is perfect for those who  want to share their passion with the world.

A clean and professional design delivers the foundations of an amazing website. A variety of pages and features will help you create an informative, interactive, and visually stunning site that is sure to capture your audience's attention.

Key features of the Outdoor Adventure template

  • Professionally designed multipurpose template
  • Attractive design that’s visually appealing
  • Fully customizable and flexible layout
  • Includes all the correct elements to build an engaging site
  • Page builder ready
id-19808.post-excerpt: Multipurpose template perfect for anyone looking to build a stylish website

id-60434.title: Electronic Store
id-60434.post-content:
The Electronic Store template is a modern eCommerce template designed to appeal to the widest audience. The main page opens with an attractive header with search, a cart and navigation while a large hero image sets the scene nicely.

The rest of the template includes a familiar eCommerce layout with plenty of whitespace and areas to showcase your products. There are also options to add testimonials, calls to action, featured products and anything else you might need for your store.

Key features of the Electronic Store template

  • Modern eCommerce template with universal appeal
  • Engaging colors, typography and header section
  • Plenty of whitespace and areas to highlights products
  • Flexible content areas throughout the design
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-60434.post-excerpt: The Electronic Store template is attractive, engaging and makes selling simple

id-94191.title: Wellness Coach
id-94191.post-content:
The Wellness Coach template creates an instant calm, relaxed vibe. Cool colors, quality images and superb design helps build confidence in both you and your business.

The homepage has appointment booking front and center, supported by information on what you offer, an attractive services page and a fully operational contact page. If cool design wasn’t enough, this template has appointment booking already integrated. Just configure it to your needs and you could be accepting clients in no time!

Key features of the Wellness Coach template

  • Invigorating design ideal for the wellness niche
  • Ideal for appointment-based businesses
  • Built-in LatePoint appointment booking 
  • SEO friendly and fully responsive
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-94191.post-excerpt: Build the perfect coaching platform using our high-converting Wellness Coach website template.

id-100918.title: Clothing Store
id-100918.post-content:
Whether you're just getting your boutique off the ground or giving your brand a refresh, the Clothing Store template has a clean, modern feel that helps your products stand out and keeps people browsing.

It loads fast, looks great on phones, and makes a solid first impression. The template comes with everything you'd expect, including tools for selling, sections for showcasing your collections, and a simple flow for the smoothest customer journey. It’s ideal for fashion brands that want to look sharp, feel polished, and sell better without overthinking it.

Key features of the Clothing Store Signature template

  • Modern design ideal for fashion retail
  • Flexible enough to be tweaked for other products
  • Fully customizable using built-in tools
  • Fully customizable using built-in tools
  • SEO-friendly structure to improve search engine rankings
id-100918.post-excerpt: The Clothing Store template is designed to get visitors in the buying mood and make it easy to convert. Everything an online store needs to succeed!

id-31992.title: Organic Store
id-31992.post-content:
Want to start an online organic store but not sure how to design a professional-looking website? We’ve got you covered with the perfect organic store template. Our website template is professionally designed with built-in WooCommerce integration, that’ll help you launch your store quickly.

The template is fully customizable and includes many features such as mobile responsiveness, product gallery, social media integration, and much more. The homepage also includes a dedicated section for customers to leave feedback on products they've purchased.

Key features of the Organic Store template

  • Clean and simple design that has all the ingredients of a perfect online store
  • Global color palettes to customize your entire store
  • Deep integrations with WooCommerce
  • Lightweight and high-converting templates to boost sales and conversions
  • Compatible with leading drag and drop page builders
id-31992.post-excerpt: The perfect lightweight organic store website templates to boost sales and conversions

id-69715.title: Planet Earth
id-69715.post-content:
The Planet Earth template is a multipurpose design that uses graphics to tell the story rather than images. It’s a well thought-out design that opens with a full screen illustration with engaging colors and a simple call to action.

The page opens into a business-style layout with alternating white and colored backgrounds, service boxes and calls to action within the page. There are also attractive supplementary pages and the opportunity to customize it and make it your own.

Key features of the Planet Earth template

  • Simple and effective multipurpose website template
  • Uses graphics and illustrations to great effect
  • Calm and engaging colors
  • Well-designed with excellent page balance
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-69715.post-excerpt: The Planet Earth multipurpose template is a captivating design with minimalist appeal

id-17534.title: Digital Agency
id-17534.post-content:
The Digital Agency template has a thoroughly modern feel with a strong homepage and bold colors. Combined with modern sans serif fonts and complementary design throughout the page, this template is perfect for both startups and more established organizations.

Pages are well laid out and contain everything a visitor would expect to see. All pages are fully customizable using your favorite page builder and can be fully customized to match your brand.

Key features of the Digital Agency template

  • Contemporary design ideal for new or more established businesses
  • Engaging colors and fonts
  • Customizable pages and layout
  • Built-in portfolio section and contact forms
  • Effective calls to action throughout
  • Full compatibility with drag and drop page builders
id-17534.post-excerpt: Fresh, modern template ideal for showcasing upstarts, startups and digital agencies

id-87989.title: Clothing Store
id-87989.post-content:
The Clothing Store template is an achingly stylish eCommerce template designed for modern retail. It opens with a full screen hero image with subtle navigation and cart feature at the top and opens into a smart store page with parallax effect.

The fully customizable template can be made to fit any brand or store type using built-in tools. You can change anything you like in seconds. The template is fully compatible with popular page builders so anyone, with any level of experience can craft something unique!

Key features of the Clothing Store template

  • Stylish modern store design
  • Engaging parallax effect on the homepage
  • Attractive product and checkout pages
  • SEO friendly and fully responsive
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-87989.post-excerpt: The Clothing Store template is a stylish take on eCommerce that’s a joy to use

id-57022.title: Tech News
id-57022.post-content:
Build a technology website using the Tech News template and share the latest trends related to technology, gadgets, software, apps, games, and more. The clean and clutter-free design will help your website visitors find what they're looking for without digging through piles of information. 

The template features a newsletter subscription form that will let you build your newsletter list quickly and easily.

Key features of the Tech News template

  • Simple and clutter-free website template, perfect for a technology website
  • The package includes well-planned layouts for individual category pages as well
  • Build an email list using the well-integrated newsletter subscription form
  • The template consists of placeholders for showcasing ads and monetizing your blog
  • Compatible with Gutenberg and all popular page builder plugins
id-57022.post-excerpt: Clean and simple website template, perfect for your technology news website
